item.title: 安装Vim8.x
item.description: 卸载系统自带的 Vim for Ubuntu dpkg -l | grep vim sudo apt-get remove vim vim-runtime vim-tiny vim-common for CentOS yum list installed | grep –i vim sudo yum remove vim-enhanced vim-common vim-filesystem 安装相关包 for Ubuntu sudo apt-get install libgtk2.
